backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a redeployment-related feature to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist verifying the Valentine proposal flow, interactions, responsiveness, and performance.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color system and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that renders the ValentineProposalFlow component.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Confetti: Creates 100 falling confetti pieces and cleans them up after animation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Floating: Spawns floating heart elements at intervals and removes them after animation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Manages memory card images with localStorage persistence, upload, and reset functions.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/At: Intro step displaying an attention message and button to continue.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Fi: Final step with YES/NO buttons, moving NO behavior, confetti, and response messages.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/He: Second step with a greeting and button to proceed.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Le: Fourth step showing a short letter and a button to continue.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Me: Third step showing three memory cards with upload and reset controls.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Centered layout wrapper applying fade‑in animation to child content.
Controls the 5‑step Valentine flow and renders steps based on current state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom theme with pink/rose color variables plus animations for hearts, confetti, and fade-in effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by rendering App inside QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and imports global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors derived from CSS variables, extended animations, typography, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and requirements for building a romantic multi-step Valentine proposal site, including features, issues, and architectural notes.
